alert.note: Alert for Bay (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 6:01PM EDT until July 14 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BAY COUNTY... At 600 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Essexville, or over Bay City, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Essexville around 605 PM EDT. Munger around 625 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bay City State Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
